title: Grouping for Traversal: `FocusTraversalGroup`
subtitle: Defining a specific area for custom navigation rules.

leftBullets.title: The First Step
leftBullets.description: `FocusTraversalGroup` is a widget that groups a set of focusable descendants together.

leftBullets.title: Defining Boundaries
leftBullets.description: Its primary job is to mark a boundary. Any traversal policy applied to it will only affect the widgets inside the group.

leftBullets.title: Requires a Policy
leftBullets.description: On its own, this widget doesn't change the traversal order. It must be paired with a `FocusTraversalPolicy` to have any effect.

leftBullets.title: The Container
leftBullets.description: Think of it as the container for your custom navigation logic. You put the widgets inside, then you tell the container what the rules are.

codeSamples.title: Wrapping Widgets in a Group
